author: cnbc.com
title: Associa Promotes Angela Frieling to Senior Vice President of Marketing
text:
Dallas, TX, March 26, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Associa , the industry’s largest community management company, announces the promotion of Angela Frieling to senior vice president of marketing.
Ms. Frieling has been with Associa for more than 12 years and held several positions including marketing manager, digital marketing director, and vice president of marketing. Her expertise is in developing successful, comprehensive marketing strategies for the Associa portfolio of brands. She also focuses on plan development and execution for advertising, events and campaign strategy and management, as well as product development.
Ms. Frieling has previously provided marketing expertise and strategy development for software and hardware solution providers in various industries, including healthcare, resale suppliers, and startups.
“The simplest definition of leadership is it is the art of motivating a group of people to act towards accomplishing a common goal,” stated Helen Carona, Associa executive vice president and chief corporate officer. “Angela is a born leader and her success comes from her ability to provide her team with specific direction, build an inspiring vision, and create positive outcomes. In her new position, she will lead by example and advance the marketing team into the next phase.”
Ms. Frieling holds a Bachelor of Arts in Business from Southwestern University.
With more than 180 branch offices across North America, Associa delivers unsurpassed management and lifestyle services to nearly five million residents worldwide. Our 10,000+ team members lead the industry with unrivaled education, expertise and trailblazing innovation. For more than 40 years, Associa has provided solutions designed to help communities achieve their vision. To learn more, visit www.associaonline.com .
